pages.text: The $(item)Food Enricher$() makes $(item)Purified Food$() (made with the $(l:hot_air/food_purifier)$(item)Food Purifier$()) more nutritious. More nutritious foods take much longer to process, and it can not improve foods beyond a certain point, but the process can be repeated several times. $(br2)Items can be inserted/extracted from any side except top and bottom.
